website_summaries.verdict: Don't let the few quirks stop you from considering this one if you want a chain wallet that looks good, has a reasonable build, and isn't too pricey.
pros: Quality leather craftsmanship for an affordable price
cons: Some owners wish the chain were a bit thinner and longer
Seams have a tendency to fray over time

customer_reviews.title: Do not want to lose  your wallet (yea right)? Get this wallet
customer_reviews.text: I lost (well found it in a travel bag days later) but not before I went through the pain and cost of getting new CCards, DLicense and all that stuff. With this chain tethered wallet problem solved. This wallet does not hold a ton of stuff but all I needed was a few CCards/DL (there a clear window for ID checks)/1 or 2 other plastics and few bills (who uses cash much?). Seems to be of a nice material with a nice chain/look and easy open clamp for belt loop it works well for me. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Garycx

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect wallet for the man who loses things. I bought this for my contractor for Christmas, because he has lost several wallets in the past. I thought this would be great for him to chain to his work pants, and this way he won't have to worry about losing his wallet anymore! He absolutely loved it, and most of his items for work happen to be Dickies. The wallet was an average sized mans wallet, and looked really well made. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Joy de Leyer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband loses his wallet EVERYWHERE. I get more of a heart attack than he does whenever I see that look on his face when he realizes he left it somewhere. We went to Vegas to get married recently, & that would've been thee WORST place to lose it haha So I got this for him! I'm glad to say, he hasn't lost his wallet since (it'll be very hard to now lol), so for 3 weeks now I've been "heart attack" free! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet but chain is too short
customer_reviews.text: Wallet is great but I found the chain way too short. I replaced it with the longer and heavier chain below and now its perfect.  I didn't rate it on durability as I only have it a week but it does look well made.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyRed

customer_reviews.title: Not what it was...
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these wallets and used it for years. Eventually I wore it out and needed to replace it. The first one was leather, and was super sturdy. This is fake leather -- Chinese garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Doughtie

customer_reviews.title: Teenage granddaughter has ordered this wallet 4 times.
customer_reviews.text: Don't know what happened to the other 3 but as soon as it arrived she dashed into her room to fill it with her cards and ID so I got a chance to check it out. Sturdy black....not flimsy or cheap looking. Sized so she fit about 10 cards in it without it being thick or bulky...nice size chain...she is delighted. .
customer_reviews.author: gmac762

customer_reviews.title: Wallet lasts for years
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my 10 year old son about 3 years ago. Today it's still holding up very well not a year or scratch on it. The chain is perfect he hasn't lost it to this day. It's very durable I'd recommend this to anyone looking for a great wallet for a awesome price
customer_reviews.author: Carpharp

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Quality made. Strong materials. It starts thin but quickly thickens up with a few cards in it. Chain itself is nice but clips are not. I used parts from old chains to improve the hooks and loops.Very much like it and it will last for a lot longer than my last couple of wallets.
customer_reviews.author: SKent

customer_reviews.title: Loving it so far
customer_reviews.text: Have been liking this wallet. My wallet kept falling out of my back pocket at places (luckily myself or someone else noticed for me every time), but I wanted to stop taking that chance. This works great. At work, I attach it right above my back pocket and tuck the chain in with it (seems more work appropriate for my office to keep it hidden). Otherwise, I attach the chain out more toward my side.
customer_reviews.author: kandibabi

customer_reviews.title: First chain wallet going strong
customer_reviews.text: Going on 9 months with my first chain wallet. It's been a huge help in keeping me from loosing, leaving, or misplacing my wallet. Seems to be holding up just fine. No issues with the chain or the grommet noticed. Strong and stylish chain. I like thin wallets and the bifold is perfect for my needs. I tend to keep wallets until they go to pieces, so 9 months is still early, but I'm very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: TheM

customer_reviews.title: A great simple traditional wallet
customer_reviews.text: Simple basic wallet, I tried others for double the money that had zipped and they were a nuisense, I tried a minimal wallet, and it just wasnt right, nothing beats a traditional type wallet, and thd chain is great since I would lose it if it didnt
customer_reviews.author: Robert Pluchino

customer_reviews.title: Never lose your wallet again!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet, the chain is about 18”, which is a great length. It’s compact and thin, but holds a lot. The leather and stitching are heavy duty and look great, so I totally recommend. I lost my wallet a couple weeks ago, and I can’t have that happen again. This wallet has eased my mind tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: V. Webb

customer_reviews.title: did the job
customer_reviews.text: i was looking for a replacement wallet after my old one disintegrated. this was just what i needed-- a lot of chain wallets are way too thick for the kind of pants i wear, and i don't have any need for 30 different card holders. i've had it for a few months now with minimal signs of wear and tear. since it's genuine leather it should last for a good while. i didn't really care for the chain, it seemed a little flimsy compared to the one i already owned, but it should be able to tolerate a few months of gentle use. ultimately, it's a good quality product and i'd definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet, chain is not.too long or too short. Its perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: We just got it today and my husband really liked it just from looking at it. The chain has alittle weight to it which is good! He is normally very picky when it comes to wallets but he liked it before even using it! Now let's just see how it holds up! So till then, 5 stars from me!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Hood

customer_reviews.title: Great simple wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great simple wallet for those who don't carry around too much with them. I was able to fit 7 laminated cards ( like debit, membership cards and library cards ) my ID and a few other things like bills and business cards.
customer_reviews.author: E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Annoying Tags.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Love how it feels, looks like good quality too. Loved all the great reviews. Chain is perfect length. Cons: The annoying multiple white tags within the same place you need to slide in your cash. Eye sore, and don't want to be reminded daily where it's made. Had a picture from the advertisement shown both tags. I would not have purchased it. Conclusion: Almost the best wallet I ever bought. Until you get to the good and most needed part. The CASH.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel A.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is nice enough - pretty much as pictured - but mine arrived with the split ring stretched out so that it does not lay flat. I would have returned it, but my son took the tags off before I pointed out the defect to him. Oh, well... We replaced the split ring, but now it doesn't match the finish of the grommet or the chain.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: shorter chains
customer_reviews.text: this is my second Dickies chain wallet. everything is still the same, as good as the first one, I bought 5 years ago. but the chains 3 inches shorter....
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: very good wallet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet for my husband because the last one from REI ended up with a broken chain that couldn't be repaired. The chain is on the large side but maybe it won't break! It keeps the wallet safely where it belongs so it doesn't drop out of a pocket etc.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Keightley

customer_reviews.title: Really nice wallet for the price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because my husband’s wallet has fallen out of his pants and gotten lost twice in the past 6months. No more worries with this! I wasn’t sure how he’d feel about having his wallet on a chain but he seems to like it and the added security of knowing it’s not going to get lost is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the wallet it is Vicky brand made really well only issue that I had with it was a chain was a little too short but that’s OK I can use it for my keys love the color I love the sturdiness
customer_reviews.author: Fidel

customer_reviews.title: Cosmetic only not functional.
customer_reviews.text: It'll give you a year of use before the chain attachement rips through the cheap leather. Chain is a cheap half metal half plastic... And I assumed it would have a snap to keep it. Closed since we (truckers and bikers) usually wear chains in case our wallets fall out of our pockets. This is not a functional chain wallet... This is a cosmetic piece only.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Well made, Just the right size.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size. Not too big so it doesn't fall out of my back pocket. I took the chain off but all of it is well made and the price is right. A very good wallet if you don't want a big bulky hump on your backside
customer_reviews.author: Mike Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Not Real Leather
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this 4 out of 5 stars mainly due to the fact that in the photo of the inside of the wallet there is "genuine leather" recessed just under the window slot. My wallet doesn't have that and it seems to be made out of faux leather if some kind. Other than that it seems to be fairly well made, and the chain is the perfect length for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lennon D. Blachly

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet, bad chain
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice wallet. The chain leaves a lot to be desired but at this price I was more interested in the wallet. It holds up very well and was exactly what I was expecting. I do recommend this wallet just not the short chain.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy LVC

customer_reviews.title: Tough wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality wallet, here. I like a lot of Dickie's products. I wear a lot of their clothing at work (shirts & pants), and, no complaints. Their stuff can take a beating... So, Yeah, this wallet is made in China, but, I admit, the quality is there, and, I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of the wallet, right out of the box. This wallet seems to be pretty tough, and so is the chain. The chain is not flimsy, nor does it feel cheap. The clasp is pretty tough, as well. Overall, I believe this wallet should last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Laney50w

customer_reviews.title: Rivet popped out.
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is nice and slim, but fell apart after a mere week of use. Specifically, there is a metal rivet in the leather by which the chain attaches to the wallet via a split ring. This metal rivet came apart from the leather. I will get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with good layout!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet for my husband. He's had it for a few years now and is very satisfied with it! Pros: - Good size - Good layout of card pockets, ID window, and side pockets - Bifold - Very sturdy! Cons: None! My husband likes this wallet so much that even after he received a nice new one from a family member as a gift last Christmas, he continued using his Dickies wallet. I don't think he ever even opened the new one! He gives it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: vaultdwellr

customer_reviews.title: Chain is a must
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Holds bills, 3 cards and ID. Need a chain wallet after one day losing my wallet just leaving it at the counter, had $490 I was going to use for rent. One bad day. Hopefully this will keep me from ever doing that again.
customer_reviews.author: aldoramon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Wallet with Security
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use while in Europe to thwart pick pocketing. Was fine and made me feel more secure about not losing my wallet, BUT it is just a little small and because some of the Euro denomination bills are large they did not fit into the wallet as well as US dollars do. Quality seems OK but I have doubts this would hold up over several years of use like a good quality leather wallet would.
customer_reviews.author: docinabox

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is slim and well made. It has a ring attached to the wallet that connects to a well made chain with a clasp. The only thing I might add is a separate belt loop that would let the clasp have an easy way to connect to your belt. I have my chain looped back on itself and that works pretty well. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: CJ from Tampa FL

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was needed.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad who is 84 years old. He lost his wallet at least once a week because it would fall out of pocket or he would take it out and lay it down. After canceling credit cards and worrying about some getting his social security info after he mislaid it, we decided to get him this wallet. It's nice and thin and light, but the chain is solid and has a great clasp. It's been great for us because we don't have to worry about him losing it when we are out. I would definitely recommend it to any son or daughter who has better things to do than constantly looking for a misplaced wallet..:)
customer_reviews.author: Patra

customer_reviews.title: Three years and it finally broke
customer_reviews.text: Ive used this wallet every day for three years and the eyelet for the chain has finally broke free. Now its just the strength of the leather keeping the wallet in my pocket but still tough. Id order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Mos

customer_reviews.title: A really nice wallet with chain
customer_reviews.text: My grandson wanted a wallet with a chain so I got him this one. It is well made and brides looking great, the chain makes it harder to lose.
customer_reviews.author: karla

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Sturdy Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if this is real leather but it certainly seems like it. I like the size of this wallet. It's nice and flat, even with my eight or so plastic cards in it, which was a major issue with my last wallets. It's also not too wide either, I think it would fit well into most pockets. The chain is nice and sturdy and not too long.
customer_reviews.author: Skull

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: There's 1 pocket. I got this wallet because I lost mine and wanted one with a chain to avoid going through that again. This wallet is great. Well made, chain is well secured, sturdy, but not heavy or bulky. Clasp easily clips onto belt loop. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: joe kohlr

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Chain loop hole ripped and I’ve had to super glue it back together 2 times
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Nice chain nice wallet. You can't go wrong here if u want a chain and bi-fold. The credit card slots are tight too.
customer_reviews.author: Double R

customer_reviews.title: China makes low quality wallets , everything is not right -crooked , comes off, bad , garbage .
customer_reviews.text: Stitches are crooked , you can tell it is not quality product , chain is just okay , I hope it lasts a year , sick and tired of all Chinese low quality products-boycott Chinese goods! Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had never had a wallet before with a chain but although I really liked my previous wallet it fell out of my pocket ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed. Had never had a wallet before with a chain but although I really liked my previous wallet it fell out of my pocket about 10 times, mostly because it was made of very slippery nylon. Only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because it's a little thicker, because it's made of leather. I like the thinnest wallet possible. Nylon with a chain would be good.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: I got this wallet to replace one I’ve had for about 20 years. Took me ages to find a normal bifold wallet with chain. So far, I’m very happy with it. It has plenty of room for everything you’d need to carry around plus some. Seems to be quite durable and well made. Hopefully this one will last another 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After misplacing his wallet one too many times I ordered this for my husband. He reluctantly agreed to wear it although he whined about not wanting to look like a teenage skate punk. Once he put it on were pleasantly surprised that the chain isn't very long which makes it less noticeable, you can hardly tell he's wearing it. We're pleased with the quality too - the chain is thick but not too heavy, and the wallet is pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kit N.

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my youngest son, I really like the chain so he doesn’t lose it. He loves to wear Dickies clothes so the wallet is a bonus for him.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Pineda

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my dad after he lost his ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad after he lost his wallet. He uses the chain to clip it either to his belt loop or to the strap of a small bag he carries with the wallet inside. As long as my mom sees the chain, she knows the wallet is there.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic wallet!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, the chain is just right unless you like it hanging to your knee. As for the review that said the stitching split and the wallet was falling apart, I have a feeling it might have been user error. Like cramming multiple cards in one slot. This is not the wallet for you if you carry around 5 credit cards, ID, misc cards ect. Great wallet for most people. Chain is good quality too. So impressed I bought another for my dad
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Made cheap but what you expect for $15
customer_reviews.text: For one i was guarenteed delivery by certain day and it didn't come till following day. I was very disappointed in that since I bought it for my bfriend & he was leaving town the day after it was suppose to arrive. Anyway, it is cheap but i just wanted something for now for him since its difficult..very difficult to find a wallet with a chain and metal ring since he likes those. Hoped the chain didn't look too cheap & a iittle heavy duty since it is made by Dickies. But we all get disappointed when we hope don't we..
customer_reviews.author: melanie t

customer_reviews.title: High quality, very well made.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a wallet with a chain for when I travel, and I didn't want the 'biker' look of a heavy chain. I also carry the wallet in a front pocket, so I didn't want a huge bulge. Previously I had a cheaper tri-fold type that was literally about an inch thick with all my cards, etc. in there. This wallet is half the thickness with the same amount of stuff. Also, the cheaper wallet had a ridiculously long heavy chain that you could tow a car with; this Dickies wallet has a chain that is half the size but very secure. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Chat

customer_reviews.title: My dad loves his new wallet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father after he lost wallet in November. He loves it and feels a lot better knowing his new wallet is securely attached to his body. I feel better, too. I wish I had thought to buy him a wallet like this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: R. Donato

customer_reviews.title: slimfold
customer_reviews.text: wow great wallet.one i had before a different brand was so bulky that when you put like two dollars in bills in it the wallet would be even more bulkier.so when i saw the word slimfold on this wallet took a chance on it,glad i did .so light not to heavy love it, plus i put a lot of bills in it and its still stays flat and slim.always get a wallet with chain lost mine two times but luckily got it back, after that a chain is what i needed.the chain is very heavy duty, kind of thick but thats not a big deal.great slimfold wallet.
customer_reviews.author: EL-CHOYA

customer_reviews.title: Buy it... you are welcome!
customer_reviews.text: Great durable wallet this is my second. One thing though is the chain is to long and i remove 6 links or less so it doesn't snap when at work.
customer_reviews.author: Joezombi74

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad, he has lost his wallet twice in the past 6 month's.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Long

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my teen son who had trouble with his wallet falling out of his pocket. He loves it! The chain and hook are sturdy and look nice. It's a great price for the value.
customer_reviews.author: beachcamper2

customer_reviews.title: Simply efficient
customer_reviews.text: It was for my 18 year old son. We were replacing the 4 month old Levi wallet that broke where the wallet meets the chain. He likes it because it is simple (not flashy) but holds everything he needs. Not sure yet how it will hold up but hopeful it will last longer then the Levi one. *NOTE- a few days after wearing it one link on the chain broke. My son removed the broken link and rejoined the chain.
customer_reviews.author: Jean9

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: After my wallet falling out of my pocket on 3 different occasions I had to get something with a chain. This works perfect
customer_reviews.author: Nich

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t like big wallets this is great for you it’s a decent size and fits all you need, only thing I wasn’t really pleased by is that the chain was kinda small if you wear shirts that go little lower than your pockets it will most likely not show as much
customer_reviews.author: George Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed this wallet for over a year now. It has lots of slots and room and pretty durable. Only downside to it was the support around the chain link over time ripped through the material but I guess that depends how often you wear a chain with it. If your one of those heavy metal individuals that wear large heavy chains this isn't the wallet for you. This is more for a small, light, stylish chain/look. I still use this for my everyday wallet today.
customer_reviews.author: Mr D.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy premium chain! Modern slimfit style!
customer_reviews.text: The chain is unexpectedly a premium sturdy chain for this price point. It definitely holds that simple look and feel I was personally looking for. I love the slim fold design. But with that comes less storage, only 3 card slots and ID slot. Feels a little too slim for me, but seems sturdy. Only time will tell. I will update in a few months after more use. Still an excellent buy and a solid 4/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: KylePalmer

customer_reviews.title: Seems durable.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this wallet for about 6 months now and its still looks great. The leather seemed a tad dry when i got it so i rubbed a little mink oil on it and it fixed that. The chain is the perfect length not too long not to short And looks great with any outfit. UPDATE: I've how had this wallet for going on 2 years still holds up... One gripe... The cardholder kinda ripped a little so cards tend to try and fly out if held upside down.. I. Just make sure I have a bunch of cards in it and it doesn't
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Thompson

customer_reviews.title: This wallet is nice. It has an adequate storage capacity for credit ...
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is nice. It has an adequate storage capacity for credit cards and business cards. I like it because most wallets that have a chain are of the tri-fold variety, and I don't like those as the tri-fold messes up one's cash. The money gets all curled up with the tri-fold. Not with this "Dickies" slimfold. Bottom line....a nice wallet for casual use and for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley H Hay

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift my nephew loves it. It's very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Juicy30

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wallet for my son. He is very picky about the kind of wallet he uses so I was very skeptical about buying on online for him. This one was a good choice. He doesn't like a very thick wallet and this one is nice and slim.
customer_reviews.author: SEE III

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet. Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this wallet for my son 13yr and godson 10yr. They both love it. I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Albertdagreat

customer_reviews.title: Good wallet
customer_reviews.text: Just received this wallet today and I'm very pleased! The shipping was very fast and the wallet was exactly how described and good quality. I like how the chain is a darker metal and not a shiny silver finish. I'm giving this as a gift so I'm sure he will like it as well. The price is also very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Codi

customer_reviews.title: Nice but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice wallet but a little flimsy and the chain should be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: J.D. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Everything my daughter was wanting! Nice, thick chain, slim wallet to fit nicely in her back pocket. Not too bulky. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: E.C.

customer_reviews.title: The design is sturdy but it needs more slots for credit cards.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the chain is sturdy. The wallet is also well made but it does not have enough room for credit cards. Other than that, it was a good purchase and great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sxm1890

customer_reviews.title: not enough space
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed. only put 4 card into wallet and its extremely tight and you struggle to take out the cards
customer_reviews.author: Justin Elkins

customer_reviews.title: Great for person with disability
customer_reviews.text: Great for my friend who is suffering from loss of arm strength. He lost his other wallet. Now he can be more safe knowing if it falls out of pocket, he still won’t lose it.
customer_reviews.author: StPeteJon

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: A great wallet. Chain is sturdy and Strong. Since purchasing, my hubby no longer loses his wallet...
customer_reviews.author: Gege

customer_reviews.title: Best chain wallet I know
customer_reviews.text: Dickies is an excellent brand and this product is by far the best chain wallet I've been able to find. It's comfortable, durable, well made, and stylish. Have not been able to find the Dickies Slimfold Chain Wallet in stores. It's more than worth it to pay postage for this product. There are so many cheap chain wallets on the market. You should be happy with the Dickies Slimfold. This item is actually sold by Cuff Crazy LLC. This company ships quickly and is very easy to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: The Scoot

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this wallet for 4 years now. It’s been my consistent everyday wallet. The chain is long enough to hang out out when you ride or hide away when your at a more formal event. The Leather has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Mattsson

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I've had this wallet for awhile now. Definitely very high quality, every other wallet I've had has started to fall apart by now. This one is still going strong! Love the chain, too.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: VERY STURDY AND ATTRACTIVE
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son, and he loves it. It's extremely well made and is a very nice wallet. The chain is also high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of losing my wallet so figured getting the chain on it will help me keep track of it. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Walls

customer_reviews.title: Really stylish, and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 issues with this one. No snap closure, and not a ton of room for cards and such. But generally, I like it. Wish it was 10% wider, and had a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dress or biking use
customer_reviews.text: Fits in any pant pocket. Chain a bit short to access wallet when attached to belt loop but that's why it can be used as a dress wallet too. Just tuck entire attached chain into your pocket. Chain can't be seen or wallet stolen. I wish it had an insert to hold pictures, either as a standard or available as an option. I pulled a picture holder from an old wallet, cut it to fit in pocket behind ID window and will work till I find a proper insert. Quality is great and should last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Danielson

customer_reviews.title: Good to Go
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new wallet and for the price it will do, it’s a little tight with everything I had to put in it, but I’m happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Orzolick

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy wallet, not bulky
customer_reviews.text: If the chain was a little linger this would have got five stars rating . It was a gift for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good wallet
customer_reviews.text: the wallet was purchased for my husband for whenever he writes his motorcycle. The only bad part about it is that if it did slip out of his back pocket everything would fall out of it because there's no snap to keep it together but overall super awesome he absolutely loves it
customer_reviews.author: natausha

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this wallet! Not too bulky, chain wasnt too long, wallet seems to be made well. Overall I am very happy with this purchase and the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Seanson

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: Got it to replace one my husband wore out. He wanted the exact same one so it works for him.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Henry

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but I would like to see a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but I would like to see a bit taller one thant would hold Euros and Pound notes and I would put the rivet and chain mount on the top corner instead of the middle but this unit is reasonably priced and the chain and clasp gives extra confidence while I'm in Europe where pick pocketing is more prevalent.
customer_reviews.author: ;ljkasd;flkjasdfk

customer_reviews.title: Good, But A Little Small
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the leather seems good and it appears to be well made. However, it is a bit small in my opinion. Wish it was a little longer and thicker. US dollars fit but just barely. Not a lot of room for credit cards, ID's, photos, business cards, etc. Chain could be a bit longer too.
customer_reviews.author: Rainmaker

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: I returned it because it was VERY 'country' larger thick chain that expected....reminded me of the 1970s lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boyfriend he loves it! Nice length of chain fits nicely on his pants and in the pocket of his pants.
customer_reviews.author: Towbnr

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Bought wallet for boyfriend, who lost his wallet while at work. The security clamp and chain is great, since it clips on his belt loop on his pants. He didn't like it at first, cause it took some getting use to. But he loves!!!!! Twinkle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slim soft leather wallet
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is ideal if if you want a wallet that does not take up a lot of space in your pocket. The chain adds style and security. Dickies is a brand I have always trusted. It is soft and has lots of room for credit cards and such. Slim, stylish and functional. I would consider it to be a casual style wallet. I bought it for myself as a gift from someone. Don't regret buying it. Con: It is delicate due to the slim size and type of leather. Don't know how long it will hold up over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bastin

customer_reviews.title: Lost keys no longer
customer_reviews.text: Works great son n law won’t lose his keys as often
customer_reviews.author: darcy

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality wallet for a good value! I would definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Mauk

customer_reviews.title: but it appears to be a good wallet. Plenty of slots for cards
customer_reviews.text: The leather is a bit thin and the chain is a little short, but it appears to be a good wallet. Plenty of slots for cards, although I had to give up some cards from my old trifold wallet. If the hole where the ring is lasts, I'll come back and rate it 5 stars... if not... then I'll send it to 2 or 1.
customer_reviews.author: Sublate

customer_reviews.title: It really takes care of the big bulging in the pocket like other wallets make
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grandson to carry in his 'skinny jeans.' He loves it and said he can't even feel it when he sits down. It really takes care of the big bulging in the pocket like other wallets make.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific quality item, and well made. Plenty of storage inside, and nice soft leather. The only reason for 4 Stars is the chain. It's very nice, but a little short for my tatse. And I like a chain that makes a bit of a bolder "statement" like this awesome chain:. However, don't let my taste on the chain deter you from buying this great wallet!
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wallet for your needs
customer_reviews.text: You get exactly what you expect. The material is ready for the days. I ride my motorcycle alot and I think it's a perfect product for what it's meant for...
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Not enough space, very poor compared to route 66 or Hot topic stocked brands, it shouldn't even have a metal chain if that's what you think is secure. It would still not get past school codes or into venues for security, might as well be plastic
customer_reviews.author: Corey W

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the easily distracted man in your life.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wallet for the money. My husband lost his wallet twice in a 2 week period. Kept taking his wallet out to pay for something and then wouldn't remember to put it back in his pocket. I purchased this to prevent a 3rd occurrence. So far, so good. This is a regular sized wallet on a fairly short, lightweight chain. Just enough to make sure his wallet follows him out of the store, not enough to make him look like a biker wanna-be.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Over 5 years old.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this around January of 2014. I have used it every day since. (Unless I'm just sitting at home) but the only issue so far is the material is a little worn down at the top corner where it folds above the ring hole.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The black Dickies wallet is really small . Compared to my brown wallet ,..really small. The chain is top quality but attached to this wallet ‘it’s not worth to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: timothy

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We recently ordered a replacement for a Dickies chain wallet that lasted years. My teenage son needs the reliability of a chain attachment on a wallet. This does the job and is stylish as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ann E Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Really good for travel
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a slim wallet with pickpocket protection for travel. This is a very good product. It has minimal pockets and is not too bulky. The chain is quite strong. There are enough pockets to keep your cash and credit cards. It doesn't have a dedicated pocket for coins; but it is not a big problem. The only thing I didn't like was it was a bit tedious to use due to the chain. But I guess you can't have everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wallet. Just as described. The chain is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena

product_meta.title: Columbia Men's Bifold Chain Wallet - High Security With ID Window And Credit Card Pockets
feature_bullets: "KEYCHAIN CARD HOLDER: Keep your keys and credit cards organized. This thin and minimalist billfold wallet allows you to carry both your cards, money and work badge all together. "
REAL LEATHER: Made from genuine leather, this heavy-duty wallet features a soft and sleek natural grain finish. The edges features stitch details for an elevated finish.

LARGE CAPACITY: This card holder wallet features 4 credit card slots, 2 slip pockets, 1 clear ID window with thumb slider for quick and easy access to your work badge or ID card; The wallet also features a large bill compartment
BIFOLD SILHOUETTE: The small and thin silhouette of this billfold wallet fits perfectly in your pocket. An ornamental Dickies logo has been added to the front of the wallet for a casual finish

IDEAL GIFT: If you need a great gift for next Christmas or Dad’s Day, this card holder is the perfect one. If you are playing Secret Santa at work, you are sure to make the perfect gift with this top brand wallet.
